stakeholder.user_message: I’m having a lot of problems with stakeholder lately.
stakeholder.AI_response: I see you are facing challenges with stakeholders. To better assist you, could you provide more specific details or concerns you have regarding stakeholders in your project? This will help me provide more targeted and helpful advice based on the information available in the knowledge base. If you can share any particular stakeholder issues or needs, I can guide you on how to address them effectively within the project context.
